uuidsGenerator.title: UUIDs Generator
uuidsGenerator.description: A Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) is a 128-bit number used to identify information in computer systems. The number of possible UUIDs is 16^32, which is 2^128 or about 3.4x10^38 (which is a very large number!).
uuidsGenerator.name: Name

ulidGenerator.title: ULID Generator
ulidGenerator.description: Generate random machine-readable Universally Unique Lexicographically Sortable Identifiers (ULID).

otpCodeGenerator.title: OTP Code Generator
otpCodeGenerator.description: Generate time-based one-time passwords (OTP) for multi-factor authentication
otpCodeGenerator.openKeyUri: Open key URI in new tab

qrCodeGenerator.title: QR Code generator
qrCodeGenerator.description: Generate and download a QR code for a URL (or plaintext) and customize background and foreground colors.
qrCodeGenerator.noQrCode: Enter text to generate QR code

wifiQrCodeGenerator.title: WiFi QR Code generator
wifiQrCodeGenerator.description: Generate a QR code for quick connection to a WiFi network.
wifiQrCodeGenerator.noQrCode: Enter WiFi details to generate QR code
